content: based on the designs of jym emmell 1 1 https //www facebook com/jym emmell 5/photos source_ref=pb_friends_tl this mosaic crochet throw seems difficult but is very easy in execution mosaic crochet is very similar to mosaic knitting you work one color per row with drops often called a long double_crochet stitch to the row of the second color to make the vertical lines this is the easiest way to learn colorwork in knitting and i think it is true for crochet as well enjoy gauge not important
